# clickhouse_clickpipe_cdc_infrastructure (Resource)

ClickPipe CDC Infrastructure resource. Manages scaling settings for CDC ClickPipes infrastructure shared across all DB ClickPipes in a service.

**Important**: Only one CDC infrastructure resource per service is supported. Creating multiple instances for the same service will cause conflicts.

This endpoint becomes available once at least one DB ClickPipe has been provisioned. The resource will poll for up to 10 minutes waiting for the endpoint to become available.

For billing purposes, 2 CPU cores and 8 GB of RAM correspond to one compute unit.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `replica_cpu_millicores` (Number) CPU in millicores for DB ClickPipes. Must be a multiple of 1000, between 1000 and 24000.
- `replica_memory_gb` (Number) Memory in GiB for DB ClickPipes. Must be a multiple of 4, between 4 and 96. Must be 4Ã— the CPU core count.
- `service_id` (String) ClickHouse Cloud service ID where the CDC infrastructure is located.
